trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were 2 other sightings in San Jose on or around March 20th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I know this sounds crazy but you have to belive me. At 6:10 Pacific time, I observed a unidentifed craft, in what s still daylight, fly over Almadan vally in San Jose. It had four lights, positioned like on the tips of a dimonand, 2 of them which were blinking several colors. It slowly crused across the sky, making a "looooooooo" sound as it zoomed away from me. I wasn t drinking or anything! Please help me make sense of this! - Scott Hamelton
